paste.description: how to use Tor Browser to access the I2P network
paste.body:
how to use Tor Browser to access the I2P network

[install i2p, start i2prouter]

close all other tabs in your Tor Browser

install FoxyProxy addon
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/foxyproxy-standard/

FoxyProxy button
Options

Turn Off FoxyProxy ----> Use Enabled Proxies By Patterns and Priority

edit default proxy
title = tor browser
type = socks5
IP = 127.0.0.1
port = 9150
Send DNS through SOCKS5 proxy = On

add new proxy
title = i2p
type = http
IP = 127.0.0.1
port = 4444
Save & Edit Patterns
White Patterns
name: all URLs ----> i2p
pattern: * ----> *.i2p
type: wildcard
http(s): both
save

add new proxy
title = no proxy
type = no proxy
Save & Edit Patterns
White Patterns
name: all URLs ----> i2p console
pattern: * ----> 127.0.0.1:7657
type: wildcard
http(s): both
New White
name: all URLs ----> zeronet
pattern: * ----> 127.0.0.1:43110
[maybe add other local ports here]
Black Patterns
remove all
save

[restart Tor Browser]



navigate to

i2p console
http://127.0.0.1:7657/

i2p ports
127.0.0.1:7657/help#portfaq
[ssl over :4445 seems deprecated]

have patience with i2p.



torrent over i2p = i2p snark

i2p-snark config
http://127.0.0.1:7657/i2psnark/configure
auto start torrents = on
theme = light [day mode]
save configuration

i2p-snark trackers
http://127.0.0.1:7657/i2psnark/configure#C.Tracker

i2p torrent index
http://tracker2.postman.i2p/
http://diftracker.i2p/



downside of i2p-snark: 
i2p has no exit nodes
so you can not connect to clearnet nodes
to bridge torrents between i2p and clearnet
you can use Vuze + I2PHelper
see
https://wiki.vuze.com/w/I2PHelper_HowTo

some clearnet torrent index sites:

the pirate bay
http://uj3wazyk5u4hnvtk.onion/
https://thepiratebay.org/
https://www.pirates-forum.org/
[all other TPB domains are fake]

snowfl-ake
http://snowflcblpoz4feg.onion/
https://snowfl.com/
https://snowfl.me/

1337x
https://1337x.to/
https://1337x.st/
https://x1337x.ws/
https://x1337x.eu/
https://x1337x.se/

----

see also
https://geti2p.net/en/about/browser-config#firefox
https://thetinhat.com/tutorials/darknets/i2p.html
https://thetinhat.com/tutorials/darknets/i2p-browser-setup-guide.html
https://thetinhat.com/tutorials/darknets/torrent-anonymously-i2p-vpn-free.html
https://privacytutorials.wordpress.com/2015/01/05/anonymous-torrenting-with-i2p-snark-installing/
